mapper.sql: partnerId, partnerType, oldCustomer, workUnitType, workUnitName, userName, phoneNumber, shopName, shopAddress, area, posterType, createTime, updateTime
mapper.select: select * from parter_user order by createTime desc limit #{start,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{length,jdbcType=BIGINT}
